title: I am Yenn, AMA
body:
Fun facts:
 - I play every role well, but prefer mid.
 - I've decayed one rank at the end of every season.
 - I work a block away from Riot.
 - I go to most California anime conventions. And get really drunk. Starting at 10:00 AM.
 - I like Asian boys.

p.s. the formatting on these board things is terrible, and these board things are terrible in general. If I wanted to feel like I'm on Reddit, I'd be on Reddit.
